text: A kúkú rí yíyí tí ò ń yí ojú rẹ sí sánmọ̀. Nítorí náà, A ó dojú rẹ kọ Ƙiblah kan tí o yọ́nú sí; nítorí náà, kọjú rẹ sí agbègbè Mọ́sálásí Haram (ní Mọkkah). Ibikíbi tí ẹ bá tún wà, ẹ kọjú yín sí agbègbè rẹ̀. Dájúdájú àwọn tí A fún ní Tírà kúkú mọ̀ pé dájúdájú òdodo ni (àṣẹ Ƙiblah) láti ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa wọn. Allāhu kò sì níí gbàgbé ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe níṣẹ́
